name: User download bin file
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Upload `bin` file.

### Verify that:

- User can download `bin` file via UI.
- Downloaded `bin` file md5 hash matches expected file.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project.
  • Upload bin file.

Verify that:

  • User can download bin file via UI.
  • Downloaded bin file md5 hash matches expected file.

  • Create new project.

  • Downloaded bin file md5 hash matches expected file.
